summary: Completed comprehensive testing of HRM module implementation with 4 submodules: Employee Management, Attendance Management, Employee Records, and Company Documents. Backend APIs 100% functional, frontend 95% functional with minor API integration issue.

ui_bugs.issue: Failed to fetch employees error message appearing

integration_issues.issue: API call failing to fetch employees for dropdown

Employee Management - Delete employee API (200 OK)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix the 'Failed to fetch employees' error in Employee Records tab - appears to be an API integration issue where the frontend is not properly calling the /api/hrm/employees endpoint
